headline: The Ritz-Carlton, Bali Voted as "Best Indonesia Resort" in DestinAsian Readers' Choice Awards 2025
summary: The Ritz-Carlton, Bali was voted the Best Indonesia Resort (Ranked No.1) in the 2025 DestinAsian Readers' Choice Awards. This prestigious recognition showcases the resort's dedication to outstanding service, world-class amenities, and an unforgettable guest experience. It further reinforces The Ritz-Carlton, Bali reputation as a luxury destination, ideal for sophisticated travelers seeking elegance and comfort.
